p.s. i'm running windows 7 32 bit. tnx

okay, so i found the golden pen games folder in my drive d,opened it and found the folder named "gta san andreas extreme edition 2011", opened the folder, and the contents are:
- GData.7z
- Golden_Pen.exe
- icon
- SData1.7z
- SData2.7z
- Setup
now what am i supposed to do with these???

It worked fine for me on XP -32 bit

Here are the instructions:

1) First unzip with 7-zip (free program)

2) Mount the iso with PowerISO (free trial program)

3) Inside the iso go into the folder called AutoRunSource and run the GTA San Andreas - Extreme Edition 2011.part1.exe

4) Change the directory path that says D:\something\something to the path where you
   want the game installed.  On my PC it is c:\games\

5) After install is successfull (leave the iso mounted) and double click the icon on your desktop.
   The path should be c:\games\sa_launcher.exe

@will93 - Yeah, I have the same problem, if you're talking about the part where they jump on the bike. In my case the game is still kinda running, birds are flying by and everything, it's just that the camera doesn't follow. 

When I minimize the game and click on it again, I'm in the menu and everything's working, so it's not frozen.

You using cheats? My best guess would be that it has something to do with them, since not everybody seems to have the problem. If I find something, I'll let ya know.

Oh yeah, I also have the problem tsitsa01 has. Don't know why it's happening, but I use the Teleporter prog, it's in the crazy trainer in the launcher menu. Just make sure you save any location before you die, then you can teleport there if you start falling. 

Cheers
